name: wikipedia
description: Search Wikipedia and get article summaries. No API key required. Use for definitions, factual overviews, and 'what is X' questions.

tools.name: wikipedia_search
tools.description: Search Wikipedia for articles matching a query. Returns titles, short snippets, and page IDs. Use when the user asks to search or find something on Wikipedia.

limit.description: Max number of results to return (default 5, max 10)

tools.name: wikipedia_summary
tools.description: Get the introductory summary (first paragraph(s)) of a Wikipedia article. Use when the user asks what something is, or for a definition or overview. Pass either a page title or a search query (first matching article will be used).

title.description: Exact article title (e.g. 'Albert Einstein'). Prefer this when the user names a specific article.

search.description: Search term to find an article (e.g. 'einstein'). Used when no exact title given; the first search result is summarized.

sentences.description: Max number of sentences in the summary (default 5, max 10)
